name: Nursing World Congress
content: Description : After the grand success of third year of nursing conference, we solicit your gracious presence at the “4th Edition - Nursing World Congress" (Nursing World 2024) which will be conducted during June 24-25, 2024 as a hybrid event at Rome, Italy and virtually. This conference will provide fresh perspectives, ideas, methods, and techniques, while no other conference will provide an exceptional mix of keynote speakers, excellent participants, and intriguing content. The many theme sessions will be discussed at this conference, and we invite everyone to attend. The Nursing World 2024 is a forum for Scientists, Engineers and Researchers to discuss and exchange Novel Ideas, Results, Experiences, and Work-in-process. This conference will also provide an excellent opportunity for the young researchers to expose their work to international scrutiny, receive feedback from peers from different parts of world, gain from the vast experience and expertise of the leaders in this important field of research and to open up the scope for new research collaborations among the international community of participants and invited delegates. Let us meet to get the tremendous experience with international experts at Rome, Italy. The Scholars Conferences community, culture of sharing and support is something really special and unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else. THEME: "Newest and Unique Research Strategies Enhancing Nursing and Health Care"
